MMASK_LEAD_EXPLANATION: To use this web app, your browser needs to have MetaMask.
MMASK_MODAL_MOBILE_BODY: Open or Install the MetaMask app.
MMASK_MODAL_BODY: Install the browser extension for MetaMask
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_EXPLANATION: The Kamon NFT proves that you are a member of the Henkaku community.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_DETAILS: You can mint a personalized Kamon NFT for 1000 $HENKAKU.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_WALLET_INSTRUCTION: To mint your Kamon NFT, connect your wallet.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_OPENSEA_INSTRUCTION_2: It may take some time for the NFT to appear.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_DISABLED_BUTTON_HOLDER: You already own a Kamon NFT
ENABLE_EXPLANATION: Please enable the website to access your $HENKAKU balance.
FORM_LABEL_PFP: Your profile picture for the Kamon NFT
SWITCH_NETWORK_MSG_2: . To use this app, switch to the Polygon (Matic) network.

toast.insufficientAmount: You don't have points to claim $HENKAKU.

QUEST.HEADING: Quests
QUEST.EXPLANATION_BODY: By answering this question you will earn 100 points, which you can redeem for $HENKAKU tokens.
QUEST.PRE_UPDATE_BODY: You may now update your Kamon NFT for it to reflect your point total. You will need to confirm and pay the gas (MATIC) for 1 transaction. You still have the points even if you don't update your NFT.
QUEST.MINT_YOUR_KAMON_HEADING: Let's get the Kamon NFT first!
QUEST.MINT_YOUR_KAMON_EXPLANATION: You can answer the questions if you own a Kamon NFT.

keyword.correct: Your answer was correct. You earn 100 points.
keyword.mustBeHolder: Only Kamon holders may answer quests.
keyword.alreadyAnswered: You have already answered this week's question.

GENERATING.TITLE: Updating Kamon NFT
GENERATING.DESCRIPTION: Generating an image with your new point total. Please wait...

UPDATETOKENMETADATA_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Could not generate your new image.

UPDATETOKEN_SUCCESS.TITLE: Kamon updated
UPDATETOKEN_SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: NFT metadata and image successfully updated.

UPDATETOKEN_REJECTED.TITLE: Transaction Rejected
UPDATETOKEN_REJECTED.DESCRIPTION: You rejected the transaction to update your Kamon NFT.

UPDATETOKEN_ERROR.TITLE: Error
UPDATETOKEN_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: The transaction to update your NFT failed.
